name: Chain Reactions
description:
Chain Reaction is a fun game where you destroy blue balls by Press the screen at the right time and position on the screen to create a large red ball so that the minimum number of little blue balls intersect (colliding) the red ball before it vanishes from the screen. Each level increases how many blue balls you need to destroy and gets more difficult. What’s your high Score?

What are you waiting for go destroy some balls!!! ^_^
